title: Waffle Makers, Warlocks & Twitter Controversy
description: The crew takes a voicemail about waffle makers (0:25), World cUpdates including rooting for rivals and warlocks with rain sticks (10:40), Tom Brady's snooze fest of an interview with Oprah (39:30), controversy in the sports media twitter verse (45:00), if we believe Phil Mickelson is super good at math (1:02:00) a Bachelorette update (1:10:00) and we take a voicemail from a super cool kid going into middle school (1:22:00).
